channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Aspirateurs robots, air fryer, lumières connectées… Le Black Friday en avance a de belles promotions sur la maison connectée
item.description: Robot aspirateur, friteuse sans huile, ampoules intelligentes, caméras de sécurité... Les indispensables de la maison connectée sont déjà en promotion à l'occasion des offres anticipées du Black Friday. C'est le moment idéal pour se lancer dans la domotique ou compléter son installation avec notre sélection des meilleures offres disponibles.

item.title: Panne mondiale d’Internet : Cloudflare est en train de résoudre le problème
item.description: Une panne massive de Cloudflare secoue Internet. Une montagne de sites web sont inaccessibles à la suite d'un incident encore inconnu. Cloudflare enquête activement sur l'origine de la panne.

item.title: L’éclatement de la bulle IA n’épargnera personne, prévient le patron de Google
item.description: Pour certains investisseurs, ce n'est pas tellement une question de si mais de quand la bulle IA explosera. Et lorsque cela arrivera, quelles seront les entreprises les plus touchées ? Le patron de Google a une petite idée sur la question.

item.title: 14 Best Housewarming Gifts We Can't Stop Using (2025): Coasters, Blenders, Sheets
item.description: Make a house into a home with these gifts, whether your recipient is moving into their first house or a great new apartment.

item.title: Samsung frappe fort à lors du pré-Black Friday avec ses 20 bonnes affaires à saisir
item.description: Samsung fait partie de ces constructeurs proposant tout un tas de produits Tech. Et, pour en profiter aux meilleurs prix, quoi de mieux que le pré-Black Friday ? De nombreuses références du constructeur sont en promotion, mais nous avons sélectionné uniquement les meilleures offres.

item.title: Windscribe's entire VPN network gets a next-gen speed and stability boost
item.description: It's a huge day for Windscribe users as "FreshScribe," a year-long project to overhaul its entire server network, is now live for everyone.

item.title: It’s not your job to fix the internet
item.description: The concept of enshittification, as coined by the author and activist Cory Doctorow, just feels right. Whether you're searching on Google, shopping on Amazon, or scrolling on Facebook, large platforms often feel like they're not trying to bring us value so much as extract every bit of value they can out of us. It wasn't […]

item.title: Lego's official Black Friday sale is less than two weeks away, but here are 6 early deals I'd buy right now
item.description: With less than two weeks until Black Friday, Lego's confirmed it's now an annual sale and is teasing some impressive discounts across major themes.

item.title: Princeton University data breach hits students, alumni - here's what we know
item.description: Names, email addresses, and postal addresses were taken, but Princeton says financial information remains secure.

item.title: A Simple WhatsApp Security Flaw Exposed 3.5 Billion Phone Numbers
item.description: By plugging tens of billions of phone numbers into WhatsApp’s contact discovery tool, researchers found “the most extensive exposure of phone numbers” ever—along with profile photos and more.

item.title: Zoox will let public riders use its robotaxis in San Francisco
item.description: Zoox is getting closer to a full launch of its robotaxi service in San Francisco. Last month, the Amazon-owned company started allowing select riders to hail its toaster-shaped, four-passenger vehicles for the first time. And today, Zoox is finally inviting members off its public waitlist, which it calls “Zoox Explorers,” to do the same. The […]

item.title: Wyze’s budget-friendly smart lock gets a Wi-Fi upgrade without a price increase
item.description: Wyze has announced a new version of its electronic door lock that features Wi-Fi, allowing it to be controlled remotely from anywhere using a mobile app or voice commands through Amazon Alexa or Google Assistant. The original Wyze Lock Bolt is currently featured in our smart lock buyer’s guide as the “best budget smart(ish) lock,” […]

item.title: Agentio secures $40 million from Forerunner as it scales its creator marketplace beyond YouTube
item.description: Agentio, which matches creators with brands, is expanding beyond YouTube and testing Meta platforms to facilitate sponsored content.

item.title: Boop’s new app turns social recommendations into bookable itineraries
item.description: Instead of getting an AI-generated travel plan, Boop aims to give users access to itineraries from real people who went on real trips.

item.title: Stack Overflow is remaking itself into an AI data provider
item.description: Stack Overflow wants to remake its classic problem-solving forum into a tool for translating human expertise into an AI-accessible format.

item.title: Zoox to begin offering robotaxi rides to public in San Francisco
item.description: This is not a large-scale public launch, nor a commercial one. But it brings the Amazon-owned company one step closer to competing with Waymo.

item.title: Zap Energy ramps up the pressure in its latest fusion device
item.description: Zap Energy's Fuze-3 device has generated record plasma pressures for the startup's unique approach to fusion power.

item.title: Creator Tayla Cannon recieves $1.1 million investment from Slow Ventures’ creator fund to build PT software
item.description: Tayla Cannon's Rebuildr receives $1.1 million investment from Slow Ventures

item.title: Bose's 5-star QuietComfort Ultra Earbuds (2nd Gen) just dropped to their lowest ever price – run to grab these!
item.description: Bose's 2025-release noise-nixing earbuds just dropped to their lowest ever price and for this money, I say buy now!

item.title: How AI tax startup Blue J torched its entire business model for ChatGPT—and became a $300 million company
item.description: In the winter of 2022, as the tech world was becoming mesmerized by the sudden, explosive arrival of OpenAI’s ChatGPT, Benjamin Alarie faced a pivotal choice. His legal tech startup, Blue J, had a respectable business built on the AI of a bygone era, serving hundreds of accounting firms with predictive models. But it had hit a ceiling.Alarie, a tenured tax law professor at the University of Toronto, saw the nascent, error-prone, yet powerful capabilities of large language models not as a curiosity, but as the future. He made a high-stakes decision: to pivot his entire company, which had been p...

item.title: The 30 most bike-friendly cities in the world
item.description: The 2025 Copenhagenize Index shows which cities have done the most—from redesigning streets to growing bike share systems and building bike storage—to make it easy to get around on two wheels. Over the last decade, dozens of cities have reshaped streets around cycling and slower, safer, healthier travel. Take Paris: at rush hour, boulevards that were once packed with cars are now filled with thousands of people on bikes, newly planted trees, and cleaner air....

item.title: Waymo is bringing fully autonomous driving to five more cities
item.description: The robotaxi company is removing the human driver from its pilot programs across two states—the latest sign of its increasing ability to scale. Before Waymo was Waymo, it was Google’s self-driving car project. Starting in 2009, the effort spent many years in test mode—with humans in the driver’s seats ready to take over, just in case—that its vision of vehicular autonomy often felt far from practical reality....

item.title: Impression 3D : Bambu Lab dévoile la H2C avec changement automatique de têtes
item.description: Vous connaissez le "poop" en impression 3D ? Ces montagnes de filament gaspillé quand on change de couleur, cette tour de purge qui consomme parfois plus de plastique que l'objet lui-même. Bambu Lab promet d'y mettre fin avec le H2C, une imprimante qui change de tête d'impression au lieu de nettoyer la buse.

item.title: Cloudflare outage takes down X one month after Musk mocked AWS customers
item.description: The infrastructure service Cloudflare faced massive outages on Tuesday morning, cutting off access to ChatGPT, Claude, Spotify, X, and other platforms.

item.title: I've spent the past month testing the Bambu Lab H2C 3D printer and it's not what I was expecting - it's actually much better
item.description: The H2C is one of the most anticipated machines for a long time, featuring not only a dual head but the Vortek Hot-end Change System. It features six mechanically mounted hot ends that are inductively heated to enable up to 7 colours/materials straight out of the box, and most importantly, a design that creates less waste than previous multifilament machines....

item.title: Une grande partie d’Internet est en panne : que se passe-t-il avec Cloudflare ?
item.description: De nombreux internautes constatent des problèmes d'accès sur des services comme X(Twitter) ou des sites liés à Cloudflare. Une panne est en cours.

item.title: Le jeu vidéo Roblox commence à contrôler l’âge de ses utilisateurs
item.description: L’éditeur du jeu vidéo américain Roblox, régulièrement accusé de ne pas suffisamment protéger ses plus jeunes joueurs, a déployé mardi un système de vérification d’âge, a-t-il annoncé dans un communiqué.

item.title: Pico 4 Ultra : le casque VR rival du Meta Quest 3 s’immerge dans le Black Friday avec 200 € de réduction
item.description: Un casque VR premium sous la barre des 400 euros ? C’est le Pico 4 Ultra qui profite du Singles Day pour afficher son prix à 399 euros au lieu de 599 euros sur Amazon.

item.title: Panne de Cloudflare | Voici pourquoi une partie du web est inaccessible
item.description: Une panne majeure affecte une partie de l’infrastructure internet mardi matin. Le géant américain Cloudflare rencontre des difficultés techniques qui paralysent l’accès à de nombreux services populaires, dont ChatGPT et le réseau social X.

item.title: ChatGPT is down - Everything we know about the latest AI outage impacting OpenAI
item.description: OpenAI products including ChatGPT and Sora are experiencing major outages.

item.title: Nvidia earnings: As AI stocks slide and Wall Street holds its breath, here’s what top analysts expect
item.description: With the chip giant reporting its financial results soon, investors across sectors will be watching for signs of an AI bubble. A lot is riding on these results. The most anticipated quarterly earnings of the month will be announced on Wednesday, November 19, as AI chip giant Nvidia Corporation (Nasdaq: NVDA) reveals financial results for its 2026 fiscal third quarter....

item.title: L’Oled va-t-il supplanter le LCD sur PC ? Les chiffres de ventes impressionnants dévoilés pour 2025
item.description: Le cabinet d'analyse TrendForce révèle que les expéditions de moniteurs OLED ont littéralement explosé pour le dernier trimestre, avec une hausse de 65% enregistrée par rapport à l'année dernière sur la même période.

item.title: Cdiscount pratique des prix bien bas pour le pré-Black Friday : voici les 16 meilleurs deals
item.description: Comme bien d’autres e-commerçants, Cdiscount propose une foule d’offres intéressantes durant le pré-Black Friday. Téléviseurs, PC portables, consoles de jeux… Certains produits très demandés bénéficient ainsi de promotions inédites. Voici les 16 meilleures offres.

item.title: The next Xbox Partner Preview has been announced, and it's set to offer a brand new look at some of our most anticipated games, including 007 First Light and Tides of Annihilation
item.description: Microsoft has announced that its next Xbox Partner Preview will air this week and feature a brand new look at some of its upcoming games.

item.title: Sony is taking $100 off its PS5 consoles for Black Friday
item.description: Sony is cutting the price of its PS5 consoles by $100 for Black Friday. Deals include a PS5 Digital Edition 825GB Fortnite bundle for $399.99 and a 1TB PS5 Fortnite bundle for $449.99 — both ship with exclusive Fortnite in-game content and 1,000 V-Bucks. While the Fortnite bundles shave $100 off the regular price of […]

item.title: 15 Best Office Chairs of 2025— I’ve Tested Nearly 60 to Pick Them
item.description: Sitting at a desk for hours? Upgrade your WFH setup and work in style with these comfy WIRED-tested seats.

item.title: X could soon show if you're using a VPN − here's all we know
item.description: X plans to display more information about users' accounts in a bid to fight trolls plaguing the platform − and VPN users could also be affected. Here's all we know.

item.title: A massive Cloudflare outage is affecting X, ChatGPT, and even Downdetector
item.description: Cloudflare, a networking company that provides DDoS protection and internet content delivery services for many companies around the globe, is working to fix a major outage that’s taking down sites across the web. Users encountered error messages when trying to access X, ChatGPT, and even the outage-tracking site DownDetector, which are now showing signs of […]...

item.title: Nintendo’s two best releases of 2025 are now available as part of an unbeatable Black Friday deal
item.description: Get a Nintendo Switch 2 bundle that includes Mario Kart World, and Game of the Year nominated Donkey Kong Bananza at a hefty Black Friday discount.

item.title: Sennheiser has dropped the price of the brilliant HD 550s to a record low in the UK – and there's a sizeable US discount too
item.description: Forget Black Friday, upgrade your gaming audio today with a lowest-ever price on the headphones that made me ditch my gaming headsets this year.

item.title: Bulletproof hosting service shut down in massive police sting
item.description: More than 250 servers were seized but no arrests were made.

item.title: Verizon vs T-Mobile: which carrier has the best Black Friday iPhone deal right now?
item.description: Verizon and T-Mobile have both released early Black Friday iPhone deals - both of which are potentially good (and potentially expensive).

item.title: MG présente sa nouvelle voiture électrique : un SUV familial pour se battre contre le Tesla Model Y
item.description: MG vient de présenter sa nouvelle voiture électrique : le S6 EV. Ce SUV familial remplace le Marvel R et chapeaute la gamme, en offrant notamment un grand coffre et une présentation plus premium.

item.description: Real-time updates, exclusive deals and expert analysis from the VPN industry

item.title: Les montres Garmin font le plein de nouveauté avec cette mise à jour majeure
item.description: Garmin a annoncé l'arrivée de sa mise à jour de novembre 2025 pour ses montres et ses compteurs vélo GPS. Au programme, un nouveau statut de santé, une meilleure gestion des notifications et des fonctions vélo avancées.

item.description: Whether you’re skiing in the backcountry or trampolining in the backyard, we have an activity tracker for you.

These are big, ambitious, and messy efforts, and we have lots of questions. So do you! We've gotten a lot of questions about Valve's huge 2026 hardware push and entry into the […]

item.title: Talking to Windows’ Copilot AI makes a computer feel incompetent
item.description: It's not hard to understand the AI future Microsoft is betting billions on - a world where computers understand what you're saying and do things for you. It's right there in the ads for the latest Copilot PCs, where people cheerfully talk to their laptops and they talk back, answering questions in natural language and […]

item.title: Zigbee’s next big update lets you add smart home devices without a hub
item.description: The Connectivity Standards Alliance has released Zigbee 4.0, an updated version of its wireless mesh networking standard with better security, improved battery life, and batch setup of new devices like smart lights, switches, and plugs. It’s also announcing a new feature called Suzi, which is short for Sub-GHz and Zigbee. While Zigbee smart home devices […]...

item.title: Intuit signs $100M+ deal with OpenAI to bring its apps to ChatGPT
item.description: Intuit said its tools, such as TurboTax, Credit Karma, QuickBooks and Mailchimp, will be accessible through ChatGPT, allowing users to ask questions and complete tasks such as estimating tax refunds, reviewing credit options, or managing business finances.

item.title: ChatGPT Free vs Paid: will upgrading actually improve your experience?
item.description: You can use ChatGPT for free, but depending on how much you want to use it, it could be time to upgrade to a paid-for version.
